item.description:
The "music farm" in Bethany is having their annual spring equinox celebration.  Come for the potluck dinner (5:30) or the bonfire (8pm).  There may have been some recent rain, so be aware the field could get muddy.

People of all ages are likely to be there...from 8 to 80.  I've been to their music/Contra dance events, the vibe is generally a bit country/hippie.  I don't expect drunken insanity, and if you're bringing alcohol, what seems to be most common at their events is wine.

I don't know how they'll work the drumming, but if you want to join in, bring a drum or improvised percussion.  I've seen a few extra drums at the farm, but not that many.

If you're a "Maybe" please say so in your RSVP

HOST: Jason, cell # in my RSVP.  Texting is fine

PARKING: See their website for parking info. 

http://www.bethanymusicanddance.com/

There are driveways to dirt lots just before and just after the house, but they're not big so you may have to park along the main road.  Or park on the nearby side-street (Hatfield Hill Rd)
item.name: Tue. 3/20 - Free Spring Equinox bonfire, potluck dinner, drumming, singing
